About me

Noah Rozin

The year is 2023. I am surrounded by interesting students, including Evan Yegorov: the mastermind, Gabriel Liberov: the ginger, and Izak Zoltan: the person who just learned about the existence of Trickle Down Economics. What is this unique environment? AP Computer Science Principles, the class most notorious for students getting 1s and wishing they just stuck with HTML.
